data.eml:eml: A new species of hynobiid salamander (Urodela: Hynobiidae: Pseudohynobius) from Southwestern China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wei, Gang, Xiong, Jian-Li, Hou, Mian, Zeng, Xiao-Mao (2009): A new species of hynobiid salamander (Urodela: Hynobiidae: Pseudohynobius) from Southwestern China. Zootaxa 2149: 62-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.188703
